I understand that Pregnancy Tracker provides general insights and tools for monitoring pregnancy progress. However, the app does not offer personalized medical advice or treatment recommendations. Any decisions regarding my health or pregnancy should be made in consultation with a qualified healthcare provider. The app is a supplementary resource and not a substitute for professional care.
I agree that my data is confidential and cannot be accessed by anyone else. Only I can view or manage my data.

I agree that the app is based on medical research and in case of emergencies, I will consult a doctor. This app does not replace professional medical advice. I will consult a qualified healthcare provider when needed.

Track your pregnancy journey with the Trimester Chart!
This chart provides a detailed overview of your pregnancy stages, divided into three trimesters:

• First Trimester (Week 1â€“13): The early phase of development.
• Second Trimester (Week 14â€“26): When your baby grows rapidly and begins to move.
• Third Trimester (Week 27â€“40): Preparing for delivery as your baby reaches full term.

Stay informed about key milestones, track your progress, and monitor important changes week by week. This helps you understand what to expect and stay connected with your babyâ€™s development.
